data.title: Excellent
data.text: We ordered take out to be delivered to our hotel. The food was delicious, and you get a lot for the price we each ordered a entree and rice it could have feed 5 people rather then 2! Quick service too! Highly recommended China Wok!!

data.title: House Special Lo Mein rocks!
data.text: We have loved take out from China Wok for years! It's high time I give them the great review they deserve. These folks are so friendly, the food is delicious, and portions are extremely generous. We get to meals for the family by ordering just 2 or 3 entrees. We love the jumbo fried shrimp to start, pot stickers are good too. Can't go wrong with orange chicken or cashew chicken and the house special fried rice and lo mein are excellent as well.

data.title: China won't be coming back soon.
data.text: They have been a great restaurant in the past but today they earned a whole 2 stars. It seems they have changed their recipes since the last time if was in. All their chicken dished start with the same cheap breaded chicken then depending on what dish you order gets a different sauce and a few additions. The cashew chicken was bland, the Kung pao chicken was no better and the fried rice wasn't. The place was busy but all of the dishes I saw looked the same. No more fresh ingredients. Just highly processed products.

data.title: quick takeout
data.text: This is my favorite restaurant for excellent Chinese takeout. My wife will call and we can get two meals for $14.00 and have enough left over for lunch the next day.

data.title: Great takeout place now has table seating
data.text: This gem has been around for a few years and has consistently good quality. We have come for sit-down lunch and many takeout dinners. The walnut chicken is especially good.  Service is consistently excellent. Good soups, good rice and great Chinese dishes. Generous choices and lunch and dinner specials that are priced to make the cost of a restaurant meal tolerable.  We will come back here again and again.

data.title: Great place
data.text: I stopped in for takeout. I ordered one order of beef and broccoli.  It comes with fried rice. Within 10 minutes I was already in my car on the way home.  Friendly cashier made a couple of suggestions for me.  When I got home my wife and I were very pleasantly surprised with the amount of food.  Very large portion of both the beef/broccoli and the rice.  Then we started munching..it was great!  My wife is hard to please; she often describes restaurant food as "naaasty". About this one she says I can stop in for takeout anytime. We had plenty left over to make a second meal for each of us. It's just a little place; I think they mostly do take-out, but there are a few tables.  Very informal.

data.title: Great value
data.text: Best Chinese food in south Jordan. And prices are great too.

data.title: Delicious food, great value.  Favorite lunch stop for law enforcement!
data.text: Delicious food, great value.  Favorite lunch stop for law enforcement!
